column5: Has anyone ever used the services of Pennocks Tourist Services in Nakina ? They have bear hunts , which is what I am interested in. They also they cater to fishermen with cabins on Lower Twin Lakes . They have boats cached on many remote lakes also. He also mentioned a motel and rental houses . Might consider a bear hunt there or maybe just an extra fishing trip besides our normal fly in trips. Thank you

Only stayed in the motel in Nakina. It was just fine. Clean and reasonably priced. It's a popular motel, mostly because there are few alternatives. Can't comment about his other side of the business though.

Same here.The only thing I can add is I have stayed at Lower Twin Lakes Lodge once in September and liked it a lot. Really friendly hosts and they have boats on back lakes too.https://www.lowertwinlakes.com/http://www.canadafishingguide.net/lo...ies-and-birds/
I haven't heard anything about there services but same as the others I have used the motel many times and no complaints about that.
